description.short: The ultimate hybrid platform combining Discord's real-time chat with Reddit's community discussions, enhanced with Web3 features.
description.full:
CRYB is the next-generation social platform that brings together the best of Discord and Reddit in one revolutionary app.

Join the revolution in online communities. Download CRYB today!

review_information.notes: Please test the core features: registration, joining communities, messaging, and voice chat. Demo credentials provided for easy testing.
